content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Shield Smack The target must succeed at a Reflex save or drop a shield it's holding. Bludgeoning
Penetrating Wound The Attack ignores all resistances. Piercing
Muscle Wound The target is enfeebled 2 until healed. Slashing
Intense Strike The attack ignores all resistances. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #42
